privacyTitle: Consent to Collection and Use of Personal Information

modal.cancelPolicyContent:
The cancellation and refund policy for this lodging reservation is as follows:

- Cancellations up to 7 days (168 hours) before check-in: Full 100% refund
- Cancellations between 24 hours and 7 days before check-in: 50% refund
- Cancellations within 24 hours or no-shows: No refund (0%)

※ Cancellations must be submitted through the cancellation request function on this site. The time of request will be used to determine the applicable policy.
※ Refunds may be subject to payment processing and refund handling fees based on the payment provider’s policy.
※ Refunds typically take 3–10 business days depending on the payment method.
※ Some promotions, discounts, or special rates may have separate refund conditions. These are explained at the reservation or payment stage.
※ In cases where cancellation is due to unavoidable circumstances (natural disasters, government orders, emergencies, etc.), a separate refund policy may apply.
※ For more details, please refer to the 'Cancellation & Refund Policy' page or contact customer service.

I have read and understood the above and agree to the cancellation and refund policy.
modal.privacyTitle: Consent to Collection and Use of Personal Information
modal.privacyContent:
I agree to the collection and use of my personal information as follows for reservation services.

1. Information Collected
- Name (First Name, Last Name)
- Contact (Phone Number, Email)
- Nationality
- Reservation details (Lodge name, Room type, Guests, Stay schedule)
- Requests (Special requests, etc.)

2. Purpose of Use
- Reservation processing and management
- Customer support for changes, cancellations, or refunds
- Payment processing and settlement
- Legal compliance and dispute resolution
- Service quality improvement and customer support
- Provision of marketing/event info (only if separately agreed)

3. Retention Period
- Retained for 5 years after reservation completion for fulfillment and follow-up purposes
- If required by law (e.g., consumer protection laws), retained for the legally mandated duration

4. Third-party Sharing & Delegation
- Personal data may be delegated to payment processors, reservation systems, customer service agencies, etc., only as necessary
- Details are specified in the Privacy Policy

5. Privacy Policy
- Detailed information on collection, use, storage, and disposal can be found anytime via the [Privacy Policy] link at the bottom of this site

6. Right to Refuse
- You have the right to refuse consent, but refusal may limit access to the reservation service

I have read and understood the above and agree to the collection and use of my personal data.
